item.description:
Everyone is invited to meet for supper around 6pm. We'll have our meal and can then sit and talk or play some games. Anyone up for Texas Hold'em? or Rook? or Phase Ten? I'll have plenty of food and dessert and sweet tea on hand, but it will be BYOB if you want that...just let me know so I can prepare a cooler to chill them.

If you have trouble finding the house, just holler at me. I'll email the address and my telephone to those RSVP'ing as "YES" a week before the dinner.

See you soon,
Cindy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one answering the door. :-)
item.why: Because your Mama doesn't live here and you need some "real" conversation. Who doesn't like a free meal that reminds you of "home"?
item.name: Louisiana Gumbo for Supper
